column1: The '''Mering Stream''', or '''''Glanhír''''' in [[Sindarin]], was the border river between [[Rohan]] and [[Gondor]].
The Mering Stream formed the border between the realms of Gondor and Rohan, together with the [[White Mountains]] and the Mouths of the [[Entwash]].<ref>{{UT
column2: Cirion}}</ref> West of the Mering Stream lay the [[Eastfold]], and to its east lay [[Anórien]]. The Mering Stream flowed through [[Firienholt]], which grew about the mountain [[Amon Anwar
column3: Halifirien]], last of the [[Warning beacons of Gondor]].<ref>{{RK
